name: typedoc-bitbucket-theme
description: An extension of the default theme from typedoc-plugin-markdown to fix Bitbucket Cloud's internal anchor linking implementation.

scripts.demo: rm -rf ./demo && yarn run build && typedoc --options ../typedoc-plugin-markdown/demo.options.json  --tsconfig ../typedoc-plugin-markdown/test/stubs/tsconfig.json --theme bitbucket --out ./demo
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build
